title: Did you know: Those that spend time with Leona often die of skin cancer?
body:
Because of this, Leona must avoid making lasting or meaningful relationships with people, lest she be forced to watch their life slowly rot away.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/ByCX1fSCYAAJ-Lw.jpg

replies.body:
Yet I love her so.

Also did you know that the UV light from the sun not only causes skin cancer, but also premature aging and wrinkles?

Yet another reason Diana is better.

http://img11.deviantart.net/7570/i/2012/233/8/4/fan_art_diana_by_sannsei-d5bv64f.jpg
but the moon just reflects the sun's light, so couldn't the same thing happen with long exposure to moon light?
i think, the risk would be aloooot less, and diana seems alright or alteast gets over death easily, and if she does get dramtic over it, it would only fuel her anger at the sun.
